formatted_address: Beach Rd, #03/00 GOLDEN MILE TOWER, Singapore 199589
name: Carnival Cinemas Singapore

reviews.text:
Carnival Cinemas offers a good movie experience, especially if you're into Indian or regional films. The auditorium is quite spacious, which adds to the comfort during screenings. While the seating could use some upgrades for better comfort, it’s still a decent setup for the price you pay.

One of the highlights here is the affordability—not just the tickets, but the movie snacks too. It's one of the few places where you can still grab popcorn and drinks without feeling overcharged. The overall atmosphere is casual and welcoming, making it a good spot for a relaxed movie night.

Big theatre.
Love that they have seatings outside waiting area too
The only Indian cinema theater that features movies from various industries, including Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Hindi and more. The screen was big, and sound quality was excellent.

The best get away for Indian Films In Singapore! This cinema Offers a wide Amount of seats and a huge screen accompanied with a good sound system. Other than the fact that there is only one screen this cinema is the best. Hope they continue with the Elderly and Student Discounts!!

A huge cinema hall for those interested  in watching Indian cinema.

The cinema hall itself is huge and clean with toilets for gents and ladies within the cinema hall.

Snacks are not expensive.  Both salted and sweet popcorn is available. Not to mention the decent samosas. Chilli sauce and tomato sauce for those interested are available in self serve press bottles.

Staff are attentive, polite and friendly.
